text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Hah! …Ugh, damn, still not good enough. 
I'm too slow! I gotta match C.B.'s flip!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: (But if I go faster, my movements get all sloppy… I just can't do it like Maruzen and Rudolf can.)

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Wait, I still have to practice my writing more too. 
Sheesh… there's so damn much to d— woah?!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Yo. Don't you think you're overdoing it?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: …Got it. Thanks, C.B…
I swear, you're always goin' off and doing something crazy without thinking twice! It's hard to keep up when you do that, y'know.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Can't help it. When I look at you, I just get the urge. So… doesn't that mean you're the one at fault here?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
But… you probably wouldn't be down 
if I did something even crazier, huh?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hahahaha, like hell I would!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: If I got upset with you over something like this, there's no way we woulda made it this far in the first place.
…Good. Yeah, that's always been you, Ace.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: You never give up. You never get discouraged. You just keep on running straight ahead, always hot on my heels like the daredevil you are.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: As if I could ever stop! When I see someone amazing right in fronta me, I just gotta keep on chasing them, y'know?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Announcer
text_block_list.text:
It's time for the Umamusume Spotlight. 
Today's featured Umamusume is Mr. C.B…

text_block_list.name: Umamusumes
text_block_list.text:
—"C.B.'s insane, isn't she? She's on a totally different level from us. 
—Apparently she went out on a run again today even though it's pouring. I could never."

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Yeah… she's awesome. She's seriously awesome. 
Damnit, like I'll let someone like her off the hook—!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Alright, me too! There's no way I'm losing to ya…!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Hah… hah…! 
…Eh?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Yo! Hard at it as always, huh?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
… you surprised me. I didn't think anybody else 
would be running in this kind of weather.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haha, what can I say! Going out for a run and getting drenched ain't bad every now and then.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Bring it on, Mr. C.B.! The name's Katsuragi Ace. Don't forget it— the name of the Umamusume who came to run with you!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Kuh… Hah… haa… gh! 
… Damn it! DAMN IT!!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah… heh… hehe! 
… Hah…
(Damn it, I didn't even see where she came from! They say end closers don't do good on soft ground, but she flipped that right on its head!)
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: (… No, that's got nothing to do with it. She did it 'cause she wanted to. There's no such thing as logic or reason in her…!)

… gh, haha. Hahaha! 
Awesome… 'aight, bring it on!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: You're a genius. No two ways about it. When a normal person would've never been able to chase me, let alone overtake me… you floored me tons of times.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: But y'know, that's what spurs me on— the way you're so unconventional. 'Cause what I'm aiming for is a rebellion of the norm…!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: That's why this time's no different! I wanna try stickin' to ya! Everything I want to do, the way I want to do it!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
You and me— common sense and the past, 
let's shatter it all to bits!

Hehe, you're just raring to go. 
… But, yeah. I do things the way I want. And you'll come and dig your teeth into me.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: That's exactly why there's no place that's off-limits to us. I'm sure… we'll soar anywhere.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Let's do it, Ace! If I'm being honest— I quite like watching you go around breaking walls.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Yeah, good to hear it. Sit back and watch to your heart's content— the way an Ace breaks the world's limits!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: I got myself all fired up, and now this?!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
Ah… ah… achoo! Sheesh… 
why'd it have to snow so damn much?!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: The field's covered in plenty of snow, too. Perhaps we ought to move performance practice to the gym for now?
Hmm… you sure about that?
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Huh?! W-wait, C.B.-san…?!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Look, don'tcha think this is fun in its own way? 
C'mon, Ace! Take off that coat!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, not again… I swear! 
Fine, fine, I'm comin', C.B…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (C.B.-san and Ace-san ran off together with not a moment to stop them. Then, together in sync, they kicked off of the ground—)

text_block_list.name: C.B. & Ace
text_block_list.text:
Haaaah! 
Hiyaaah!
(It's as if they were soaring through the sky! The snow they kicked up fluttered around them, sparkling, reflecting the brilliance of the sun.)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Gh, it's… so bright…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …C.B., Ace… did you just…

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: … We synced up.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I'd always been a second too late… but just now, we—!
Yeah! It was perfect!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I tried to match your speed, the faster 
I tried to flip, the worse my form got…
But I was so worried about slippin' on the snow just now, it felt like my senses got a lot sharper without realizing!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: I see… so that's what got you to demolish that wall you spoke of. Rather, you could say we've got another predicament on our hands now…
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Hehe… Ahahaha! So you used that as fuel too, huh, Ace? Sounds about right!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Never thought the snowy ground would make our performance better. That's real unconventional of you! Ahahaha!

Hahahaha! You're the one person 
I don't wanna hear that from!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: (C.B.-san… and Ace-san, too. They're just… so bright…)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: (They break down every wall like it's nothing. That radiance is just overwhelming…)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
—Mejiro Ramonu is in top shape. She's as beautiful as ever. 
—Indeed. When she dances, she shines just like a precious gemstone…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …Gh.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: (Oh, Ardan-chan…)
